reviews.text: The Food was really tasty and authentic. One main dish should be enough per person. We had the sausages, pork, gnocchis with goulash and a Slovenian pasta. All that with salad and beer. For dessert we had the apple pie and a traditional dessert. The staff was welcoming and nice. However, it was a little bit overpriced.

The restaurant is on a corner which affords it two sides of outdoor seating. The inside has a fine dining feel and there are nice bathrooms located in the basement. The food was delicious, with the pork loins being particularly tender and juicy. Drinks are fairly priced and food tends on the more expensive side but not unreasonable for the quality. The service was quick and friendly.

You can sit outside - on the riverside even in the winter. They have under-table electric heaters and blankets. You will feel cozy and warm. ☺ Sparrows and pigeons are like pets here, they will land on your table or chair looking for food. Very nice view on the river. Excellent service ☆☆☆☆☆

Service is on point and the food is delicious. Ordered the lamb and was very happy with the order. The wine selection is good and the view of the river just accentuates the place. Right next to the bridge and they do speak English if you needed. Don't fill up on just one dish because their menu is huge. On that note you will not leave here disappointed!

Had dinner here and the food was amazing. Tasty and well presented. It might be a bit pricey considering nearby places but it is well worth it IMO.

The staff is really nice as well.
Would recommend it if you wanna have somewhat of a classy meal and a chill atmosphere.
